comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Accompanying note: "Leon County FFA boys fight fire at a Florida Forest Service demonstration in good forest management practices at the J.W. Williams Memorial Forest in observation of FFA week which begins tomorrow. Left to right are Gene Love, Jimmy Grubbs, Harris Johnson, Pete Crandall and W.L. Foyler, county ranger in charge of the Fire Control Division. O.Z. Revell is chapter advisor of the Leon FFA."
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
